title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your bite may be just as bad as your bark today. A disagreement might present a test to a valuable friendship. Cooling down heated words and intense feelings goes a long way toward preventing a bad situation from becoming worse. Take a time-out to simmer down and nurse your own hurt emotions. However, dont become too self-righteous about the injustice done to you. Chances are your friend feels the same way now. There are always two sides to a story, so wait for the moment when you can better hear each others version. Settle down and play nice. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
